STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Create mouthwatering mobile apps for restaurants, recipes, and culinary adventures
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from happy home chefs using our app to build delicious foods.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has made cooking at home so much easier and more enjoyable. The step-by-step recipes and helpful tips have really taken my meal prep game to the next level.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As someone who doesn't have a lot of experience in the kitchen, this app has been a lifesaver. The simple instructions and creative recipe ideas have helped me become a much better cook.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've been really impressed with the variety of recipes and cuisines represented in this app. It's helped me explore new flavors and cooking techniques I never would have tried otherwise.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our food construction app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What types of foods can I build?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: With our app, you can construct a wide variety of dishes from simple snacks to complex meals. Use our library of ingredients and recipes to create anything from sandwiches and salads to multi-course feasts.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the building process work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: First, select a recipe or start from scratch. Next, add ingredients from our catalog to a virtual workspace. Arrange and 'construct' the food item step-by-step, following visual guides. When finished, you can view the completed dish from multiple angles.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I save and share my food creations?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! You can save unlimited food designs to your personal library. Share your culinary constructions with friends via a unique shareable link or on our community gallery.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is this app just for fun or can I use it professionally?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: While very entertaining, our app can also serve as a useful tool for professional chefs, food stylists, and bloggers. Realistic renders let you prototype dishes before preparing them for real.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How much does the app cost?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: The basic app is free to download and use. We offer an optional premium subscription that unlocks advanced features like unlimited ingredient varieties, enhanced rendering modes, and ad-free building.

STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: FoodCraft is a revolutionary platform that empowers you to design, customize, and bring your culinary visions to life. Unleash your creativity and craft mouthwatering masterpieces with our user-friendly tools and vast array of ingredients. Join our vibrant community of food enthusiasts and embark on a delectable journey of culinary exploration.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Easily build custom recipes with our intuitive drag-and-drop interface. Combine ingredients, add instructions, and craft delicious meals with ease.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Access our extensive database of ingredients from around the world. Explore unique flavors and discover new culinary inspirations.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Accommodate various dietary needs by filtering recipes based on preferences like vegan, gluten-free, or keto-friendly options.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Automatically generate shopping lists based on your selected recipes, streamlining your grocery trips and minimizing waste.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Connect with fellow food enthusiasts, share your culinary creations, and collaborate on recipes within our vibrant community.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Create customized meal plans tailored to your dietary goals, schedule, and preferences, making healthy eating a breeze.
CTA_BODY: Craft mouthwatering dishes with our intuitive app for building foods. From planning recipes to grocery lists, we've got you covered.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Building Foods
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What types of foods can I build with this app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app allows you to virtually construct a wide variety of foods, from simple snacks to elaborate multi-course meals. You can experiment with different ingredients, flavors, and cooking techniques to create unique culinary masterpieces.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Do I need any special equipment or skills?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: No special equipment is required, just your imagination! However, having some basic cooking knowledge will help you understand food preparation techniques and flavor combinations better.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I share my food creations with others?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! One of the key features of our app is the ability to share your virtual food constructions with a community of fellow food enthusiasts. You can showcase your creations, get feedback, and find inspiration from others.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is this app suitable for kids?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our app is family-friendly and suitable for kids. Building virtual foods is not only fun but also educational, as it helps develop creativity and an understanding of food preparation.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app makes building delectable dishes a breeze. Explore a vast collection of recipes and create mouthwatering meals with ease.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Never run out of ingredients again! Our smart tracking system keeps you updated on what's in your pantry and what needs restocking.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Unleash your inner chef with our innovative recipe builder. Craft unique flavors by mixing and matching ingredients to your heart's content.
